Class SDES

  • java.lang.Object
    • SDES
  • public class SDES
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for performing SDES encryption and decryption
    Framework based on http://cs.rowan.edu/~bergmann/crypto/projects/project2/doc/
    Author:
    Brian Intile, Mantas Pileckis, Matthew DeGenaro

        public byte[] encrypt​(java.lang.String msg)
        Encrypt the given string used SDES each character produces a byte of cipher.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        An array of bytes representing the cypher text.

        Parameters:

        x - 4 digit boolean array input
        Returns:

      • f

        public boolean[] f​(boolean[] x,
                   boolean[] k)
        Read in a 8 digit boolean array and key, then apply the 'round' function
        Parameters:
        x - boolean array to which the function f will be applied
        k - boolean array holding the key to be used in the feistel function
        Returns:
        returns boolean array after the 'round' function has been applied

      • sBox

        public boolean[] sBox​(boolean[] x,
                      int boxNum)
        Read in a 4 digit boolean array and return the corresponding sBox 2 digit code
        Parameters:
        x - boolean array to be passed to sBox
        boxNum - determines which sBox to use, 0 or 1
        Returns:
        returns a boolean array with the resulting 2 digit code
